original_title: Pawns No More: The Making of The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 2
overview: This making of The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2 is presented in 8 parts. Each part gives an in depth view of one aspect of creating the movie. You can see how special effects were used; costumes and make-up was done; all about the casting and location of the movie; and much more. This is done by interviews with the cast and crew as well as with fragments from the movie and images from behind the scenes.  - Walking through Fire: Concluding the Saga (13:07)  - Real or Not Real: Visual Design (9:57)  - High Value Targets: The Acting Ensemble (16:33)  - From Head to Toe: Costumes, Make-up and Hair (13:38)  - Navigation the Minefield: Production in Atlanta, Paris and Berlin (13:06)  - Collateral Damage: Stunts, Special Effects and Weapons (18:04)  - Tightening the Noose: The Post-production Process (28:43)  - A Different World: Reflection (22:33).
title: Pawns No More: The Making of The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 2
